TopicTitle: Game breaking, Vehicles floating away and krakening when returning to KSC after landing

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 5800x | GPU: 3080ti | RAM: 32gb

 

I landed a craft and rover on Duna. Following the successful landing every time I try to return to VAB, Tracking Center, KSC the UI shows up over the existing screen on duna and breaks gravity, causes the kraken, and kills the flight the whole game file appears to be corrupt its happening across multiple saves now. Additionally almost every save and load (on different quick and hard saves) cause the craft to fall through the ground before i even try to leave Duna view.  Thanks guys.

 

Included Attachments:

Edited July 9, 2023 by Anth12

3 hours ago, Aersoe said:

I landed a craft and rover on Duna. Following the successful landing every time I try to return to VAB, Tracking Center, KSC the UI shows up over the existing screen on duna and breaks gravity, causes the kraken, and kills the flight the whole game file appears to be corrupt its happening across multiple saves now. Additionally almost every save and load (on different quick and hard saves) cause the craft to fall through the ground before i even try to leave Duna view.  Thanks guys.

Thanks for the bug report. Any way you can supply a save file for when the scene on Duna is actually ok? Before all the issues start happening?

I haven't played a lot of 0.1.3.0 but in 0.1.2.0 going directly to the KSC Screen is a sort reset point. Its not perfect but it does help sometimes.
Most Importantly: I don't recommend returning directly to the VAB because a bug has been causing all the crafts left behind to end up under the ground on revisiting the scene.
